channel.title: CVE Feed for Pure Storage -- FlashArray
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pure Storage -- FlashArray

item.title: CVE-2024-0001|2024-09-23T17:34:40.076Z -- pure%20storage -- flasharray
item.description: A condition exists in FlashArray Purity whereby a local account intended for initial array configuration remains active potentially allowing a malicious actor to gain elevated privileges.
